Install Visual Paradigm Community Edition SDE for Eclipse. Open Eclipse once this is done to check it works.

Install [http://www.topcased.org/ Topcased] org.topcased.sdk-3.3.0.zip (a little bit under 30megs) by dragging and dropping the downloaded files into the Eclipse plugins directory. 

  * File
  * New
  * Project
  * Expand Topcased
  * Select Topcased Project
  * Expand project in project explorer, models folder should appear
  * Right click the models folder
  * New
  * Select UML model with TOPCASED
  * Name the new model
  * Open the .umldi file (graphical representation)
  * You should be able to add classes using the interface presented
  * To add a state machine double click on the class you want to build one for. A dialog box will appear. Select State Machine Diagram and click ok.
  * When adding transitions use the 'External Transition' option
  * The .uml file with the same name as the .umldi file can be plugged into GRAF
